div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Sept. 19, 1902. [TABITHA HOSPITAL SOCIETY]Erie Branch

body.p: The Erie Branch of the Tabitha Hospital Society passed the following resolution:

"Because a certain group has viciously and unlawfully stolen the power in the Tabitha Hospital Society; and, Because this group wishes to raise finances through lotteries, dances, and the sale of intoxicating liquors, we have unanimously resolved to withdraw in a body from the Society."
The Erie Branch is the first to take this step; will others follow?
